text: "She Left Me on Friday" is the second single taken from the Shed Seven album Let It Ride. It was released on 2 March 1998 and made it to number 11 on the UK Singles Chart. The song also appears on the band's compilation albums Going For Gold and The Singles Collection, along with the live albums Where Have You Been Tonight? and Live At The BBC. ==Track listing== ;7" vinyl #She Left Me On Friday (3:31) #Bottom Upwards (4:28) ;CD1 #She Left Me On Friday (3:31) #Bottom Upwards (4:28) #Melpomene (3:20) ;CD2 #She Left Me On Friday (3:31) #My Misspent Youth (3:32) #You (4:58) ==External links== * Category:1998 singles Category:Shed Seven songs
title: She Left Me on Friday
